short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily send documents through Documi from inside Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ALPHA - Documi for Gmail allows you to easily send protected documents through Documi alongside your emails. When enabled, Documi will automatically intercept attachments and will reply to your email with custom magic links for each recipient.  Apply controls to limit who can see what and under which conditions - down to the page level. Track what your recipients have read via the Details link in your reply or visit the Documi dashboard at https://api.documi.app.

PDF and image formats are currently supported.

You can enable or disable Documi via the icon in the lower left.

Please note that this is an open alpha. You may encounter bugs or incomplete features. Please report any errors or unexpected behaviors.
